prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that resembles a jelly-like creature with soft edges and a calm demeanor.
I want a Pokemon that embodies tranquility and has a soothing green color palette with smooth curves.
Generate a cute, amorphous Pokemon that has a round shape and emits a gentle glow in battle.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a small, floating blob with large eyes and a serene expression.
Imagine a Pokemon with a jelly-like body, primarily green, that can change forms during evolution.
Design a unique creature that has a squishy appearance and a playful personality, perfect for kids.
Show me a Pokemon that combines softness with intelligence, featuring light green tones and a quirky smile.
